Package soc.server.database

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SOCDBHelper.AuthPasswordRunnable
    Interface for callbacks from SOCDBHelper.authenticateUserPassword(String, String, AuthPasswordRunnable).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BCrypt
    BCrypt implements OpenBSD-style Blowfish password hashing using the scheme described in "A Future-Adaptable Password Scheme" by Niels Provos and David Mazieres.
    SOCDBHelper
    This class contains methods for connecting to a database and for manipulating the data stored there.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DBSettingMismatchException
    This exception indicates SOCDBHelper.initialize(String, String, Properties) was called with one or more properties which are also in the settings table but with different values.
